**JF(Jungle Flavors) Lemon Juicy**  
*Summary*  
This is a nice, natural, sweet lemon flavor. It's not necessarily tart, or bitter, or acidic; just a straight up sweet lemon flavor. It's almost reminiscent of those lemon drop candies, but less artificial tasting. I can see this working very well in bakeries, candies, and beverage flavors. The first place my palate wants to take this is like a lemon meringue pie. I've tried this at 1%, 3%, and 5%. 3% seems to be the cap, 1% was a little too weak, and 5% I didn't get anything extra out of it than I did at 3%. This flavoring oughtn't need to steep as it's a fruit, seems to be low in acids, and has an inherent sweetness about it.  

**Single Flavor Testing Notes**  

*5/29
shake-n-vape* 

Right away I notice Juicy Lemon doesn't seem to cloud up a mix like FA Lemon Sicily or other citruses, possibly due to a lower citric acid content.  

On the nose I get kind of a sweet lemon, almost reminiscent of those lemon drop candies.  

@3% this is a really nice lemon flavor. It's not bitter or tart or anything just straight lemon. Sweet too, almost like a lemon candy but not artificial.  

@5% not gaining anything extra from it than I did at 3% so I'm thinking 3% is going to be a cap for this flavoring  

@1% The lemon is just barely there, not prominent enough to be noticeable even in a mix methinks.
